Description:
Solid first home or investment.
Searching for the perfect property with room to move? This 3 Bedroom property provides more than meets the eye, this home is sure to be well sort after by all! Neatly presented and situated on an impressive 661m2 allotment, this property is ideal for families, first home buyers or investors looking for a home with scope to add their own touches. This elaborate home boasts 3 generous bedrooms in total 2 with BIRs, comfortable lounge at the front with gas heater, stylishly renovated central bathroom with separate shower and spa bath, a well-proportioned kitchen and adjoining meals area. The backyard provides a 11x7.5m garage with 6 car capacity with side gate access to the property. This property is sure to appeal to all who need extra space for the caravan, boat or storage. The large yard provides an undercover area, great for entertaining and plenty of space for the kids to play. Located just minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, parks & reserves. Easy access to public transport with bus stops just around the corner, and the Princes Highway close by means of just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's waterfront and CBD. With such a terrific position and fantastic potential this home will not last. Be sure to inspect this before it's too late!
Insights: 44 Purnell Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
697m2 approx. parcel of land in prime position.
Take advantage today of this exceptional development or investment opportunity as properties with this much value do not come on the market often! The creative and innovative buyer will appreciate the freedom to renovate and transform the property into a stylish home that suits their needs. Situated on an extremely generous allotment of 697m2 (approx.). The neat home provides 3 comfortable sized bedrooms, a generous lounge at the front of the property complete with heater and air conditioner, practical kitchen containing ample cupboard space and room for a meals area. The convenient central bathroom with separate toilet located opposite the laundry. The backyard provides ample room to retain the existing home and construct additional dwellings at the rear (STCA). Conveniently close to all amenities with a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools and more. With such a large allotment and so much potential, this is sure to be a well sought after opportunity.

Description:
SOLD BY SHARON BRINCAT 0422409940
With quick access to freeway,local schools, kindergartens and shopping centers Banksia Sq is a must see for all first home buyers or investors looking to enter the market. Well presented brick veneer home comprises 3 spacious bedrooms all with spacious built in robes. The central gallery style kitchen is positioned central and overlooks the 2 separate living spaces and family dining are and comes am with all mod cons. Main bathroom with toilet as well as another separate toilet. Double remote control garage with secured office space. The back yard includes a massive alfresco area , A great space for family, a great investment to add to your investment portfolio.
Following features
All windows are furnished/ Holland blinds
Gas continues hot water service
Electric Wall oven and gas cook-top
Dishwasher
Ceiling fans throughout home
Gas Wall furnace
2x Reverse cycle heating/cooling
New carpets
Video camera surveillance with 4 cameras
Front porch enclosed with Cafe blinds and sliding door access to home
Decorative ceiling roses
Remote control double garage
Several undercover areas and large alfresco area
Double fronted brick veneer
2 garden sheds
Sleep out
Secured separate office and much more > contact Sharon on 0422409940 for your inspection

Description:
Spacious & light filled 3 bedroom townhouse.
Enjoy all the benefits of low-maintenance contemporary living in this immaculately presented residence in the heart of Corio accessible to all major amenities providing an easy and convenient lifestyle. You won't be disappointed with this stylish & spacious townhouse boasting large light filled rooms and a functional floor plan. Situated on 256m2 (approx.) the home comprises of three bedrooms with two of them located upstairs and providing 2-way access to the bathroom. Plenty of storage space can be found throughout the house in pockets you wouldn't think of. Down stairs contains a large lounge, dining and stylish kitchen complete with gas cooking and a large island bench great for entertaining family and friends, as well as the generous master suite opposite the central bathroom and separate laundry. Perfectly situated near schools, pre-schools, sports grounds and Corio Shopping Centre along with Geelong's CBD only a 15 minutes' drive away. No matter what your reason is for purchasing a home, this property has it all for owner occupiers and investors alike. Don't miss out on the fantastic opportunity.
Insights: 2/6 Rotella Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Perfect Position!
Enviably positioned close to shops, schools and public transport, this family residence is a great investment or first home. Characterized by contemporary renovations and beautiful light-filled spaces, this low-maintenance home features 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, modern bathroom with vessel basin, tiled shower and contrasting light and dark tones. Description:
The complete package- 4 bedroom, 2 bathrooms in growth area
With a recent freshen up inside and out, you'll be pleasantly surprised when you enter. The family friendly layout offers lounge with gas log fire, dining with split system aircon and well appointed kitchen opening onto undercover patio area. 4 bedrooms, master upstairs with parents retreat and ensuite. The 3 downstairs bedrooms have robes and share the updated family bathroom with shower recess and bath. Freshly painted throughout with new carpet and blinds and external trims painted too, the home presents really well and would be equally appealing to first home buyers or investors alike. With good rear yard access for vehicles or boat/van and remote single garage with workshop is ideal for secure storage on 532m2 allotment.
With growth in the area at an all-time high due to the convenient location close to schools, Ring Road access and public transport. Call today for more information.

Description:
Proximity Plus....
When searching for the perfect investment or family home, the location is always high on the list. This 4 bedroom plus study home offers you a court location within easy walking of the Corio Village Shopping Complex, the Northern Bay College (Goldsworthy Rd Campus) and the Northern Bay Early Learning Centre and Kindergarten. This means your shopping and school choices are ticked off the list. If commuting to Melbourne is important, you can access the Melbourne Hwy easily.
The property is currently tenanted on a periodic tenancy to a long-term tenant at $340 per week. The original lounge room has been converted to a large master bedroom with airconditioning and built in robes. The rear of the property has been extended to include a spacious lounge with split system, and good size separate study.
To complete this property we have a 4 car garage with lighting and concrete flooring, and an extra carport in front of the garage.
Please feel free to call or email for further details or book your inspection.

Description:
Great value family home or investment.
Nestled in a quiet court location on a large 620m2 block (approx) lies this charming 3 bedroom brick veneer home with ample living spaces for the whole family to enjoy. Whether you're searching for a neat investment opportunity or family home this property is sure to tick a lot of boxes. The property boasts 3 generous sized bedrooms the master suit including ensuite. The large renovated kitchen provides a 900m stainless steel oven, large cupboards and plenty of bench space overlooking the meals area. Outdoors presents a fantastic area for those who enjoy entertaining which includes an undercover paved alfresco which leads down to the well-presented and easy to maintain backyard and comes complete with DLUG. An added bonus of this sensational family home is the 24 solar panels located on the roof that will significantly benefit the new owner's electricity bills. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD only 15 minutes, along with the Corio Shopping Centre in walking distance, bus stops close by, local school and sporting grounds. Description:
Priced to sell before Christmas
Set in Corio's fastest growing Cloverdale Estate this home offers the space you've been looking for. The ideal investment or first home the property has new carpet and has been freshly painted throughout. With 2 living areas, U Shaped Kitchen with dining area, 3 bedrooms with robes and 2 bathrooms including ensuite to master. There's an outdoor patio area and securely fenced yard, with access to lock up garage all sitting on 530m2 corner allotment. With potential rental of $320pw this would be the perfect addition to your investment portfolio. Priced to sell for a quick sale, don't miss out on this one.

Description:
844m2 approx. allotment in the heart of Corio.
Don't miss your opportunity to secure this neat, brick veneer family home situated on an incredible 844m2 approx. parcel of land just minutes from the Corio Shopping Centre. Nestled in a quiet court location surrounded by established homes you'd be hard pressed to find such a lavish allotment in such a brilliant location. Perfect for all buyers alike the property offers an array of different possibilities for its new owners, whether you're looking for an ideal family home with a large back yard, an investment property close to all amenities or looking to potentially sub-divide and develop (STCA). The home itself comprises of a large lounge room at the entrance with floorboards that flow throughout the home. The practical kitchen offers ample bench space adjacent the meals area that opens to the study nook. All three generous bedrooms sit at the rear of the home with easy access to the central bathroom and laundry. Outside you're sure to be impressed with the vast space that is on offer. The large drive way leads to an undercover carport and continues towards the extended double garage complete with additional workshop. Plenty of room remains for pets and the whole family to enjoy. Located with all major amenities right on your doorstep, with schools for all ages located just a short stroll away & public transport easily accessible what more could you want?
Insights: 4 Durham Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Ideal Investment Opportunity"
Take advantage of this opportunity to secure a fantastic large corner block in a residential growth zone. A location central to all amenities in Corio and Norlane, this home will be the first on your list! It is within close proximity to local schools, bus routes, medical facilities, sporting grounds, and a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD only 15 minutes.
-Master bedroom with ensuite
-1 bedroom with BIR, CF & split system
-Kitchen has SSS, gas CT & wall oven
-Updated main bathroom
-Large backyard
-Side access for caravan and boat storage
